p: In view of the importance of the L position and the length of the tail, we attempt to insert a methylene between the L position and the phenyl leading to derivatives X14– X23 ( Table 1). Excitingly, X19– X23 were proved high inhibition on all three kinases as well as no obvious difference for the enzymatic activity but X23. We summarised the structure–activity relationships as shown in Supplementary Figure S2.
